title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XIX, pt. 900 - Equal Opportunity In Employment-nondiscrimination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XIX, pt. 900 - Equal Opportunity In Employment-nondiscrimination

State Regulations
§ 900.1 - Nondiscrimination
§ 900.2 - Compliance reports

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XIX, pt. 900

Statutory authority: Education Law, §454, subd. 5

Statement of Policy. Whereas, it is the policy of the New

York City Educational Construction Fund to prohibit discrimination in
employment because of race, creed, color or national origin and to promote the
full realization of equal employment opportunity through an affirmative, continuing program of compliance by all developers and contractors doing
business with the fund and their subcontractors, Part 900 is herewith
promulgated. All contracts of the fund with any developer and/or general
contractor (hereinafter referred to as the "contractor" shall contain the
following provisions: State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
